This is a post with executable code.

간단한 시각화를 해봅시다. 
Render가 계속 가능


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Example data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [10, 8, 6, 4, 2]

# Create scatter plot
plt.scatter(x, y)

# Add labels and title
plt.xlabel('X axis label')
plt.ylabel('Y axis label')
plt.title('Simple Scatter Plot')

# Show plot
plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Python과 R을 넘나들며 코딩이 가능합니다.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- 5
b <- 10

library(ggplot2)
qplot(1:10)
```
